CourseOffering.name: CourseOffering
CourseOffering.description: Represents an instance of a training course with location and date details of training courses

CourseNameId.description: The ID of the course name.

EndDate.description: The end date of the course.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

LocationId.description: The ID of the location this course was offered.

Name.description: The name of the course offered.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of this record.

StartDate.description: The start date of the course.
